location: The house of ANTIPHOLUS of Ephesus.

lines.text: Enter ADRIANA and LUCIANA

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: Ah, Luciana, did he tempt thee so? Mightst thou perceive austerely in his eye That he did plead in earnest? yea or no? Look'd he or red or pale, or sad or merrily? What observation madest thou in this case Of his heart's meteors tilting in his face?

lines.speaker: luciana
lines.text: First he denied you had in him no right.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: He meant he did me none; the more my spite.

lines.speaker: luciana
lines.text: Then swore he that he was a stranger here.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: And true he swore, though yet forsworn he were.

lines.speaker: luciana
lines.text: Then pleaded I for you.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: And what said he?

lines.speaker: luciana
lines.text: That love I begg'd for you he begg'd of me.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: With what persuasion did he tempt thy love?

lines.speaker: luciana
lines.text: With words that in an honest suit might move. First he did praise my beauty, then my speech.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: Didst speak him fair?

lines.speaker: luciana
lines.text: Have patience, I beseech.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: I cannot, nor I will not, hold me still; My tongue, though not my heart, shall have his will. He is deformed, crooked, old and sere, Ill-faced, worse bodied, shapeless everywhere; Vicious, ungentle, foolish, blunt, unkind; Stigmatical in making, worse in mind.

lines.speaker: luciana
lines.text: Who would be jealous then of such a one? No evil lost is wail'd when it is gone.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: Ah, but I think him better than I say, And yet would herein others' eyes were worse. Far from her nest the lapwing cries away: My heart prays for him, though my tongue do curse.
Enter DROMIO of Syracuse

lines.speaker: dromio of syracuse
lines.text: Here! go; the desk, the purse! sweet, now, make haste.

lines.speaker: luciana
lines.text: How hast thou lost thy breath?

lines.speaker: dromio of syracuse
lines.text: By running fast.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: Where is thy master, Dromio? is he well?

lines.speaker: dromio of syracuse
lines.text: No, he's in Tartar limbo, worse than hell. A devil in an everlasting garment hath him; One whose hard heart is button'd up with steel; A fiend, a fury, pitiless and rough; A wolf, nay, worse, a fellow all in buff; A back-friend, a shoulder-clapper, one that countermands The passages of alleys, creeks and narrow lands; A hound that runs counter and yet draws dryfoot well; One that before the judgement carries poor souls to hell.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: Why, man, what is the matter?

lines.speaker: dromio of syracuse
lines.text: I do not know the matter: he is 'rested on the case.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: What, is he arrested? Tell me at whose suit.

lines.speaker: dromio of syracuse
lines.text: I know not at whose suit he is arrested well; But he's in a suit of buff which 'rested him, that can I tell. Will you send him, mistress, redemption, the money in his desk?

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: Go fetch it, sister. This I wonder at, That he, unknown to me, should be in debt. Tell me, was he arrested on a band?
Exit Luciana

lines.speaker: dromio of syracuse
lines.text: Not on a band, but on a stronger thing; A chain, a chain! Do you not hear it ring?

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: What, the chain?

lines.speaker: dromio of syracuse
lines.text: No, no, the bell: 'tis time that I were gone: It was two ere I left him, and now the clock strikes one.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: The hours come back! that did I never hear.

lines.speaker: dromio of syracuse
lines.text: O, yes; if any hour meet a sergeant, a' turns back for very fear.

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: As if Time were in debt! how fondly dost thou reason!

lines.speaker: dromio of syracuse
lines.text: Time is a very bankrupt, and owes more than he's worth, to season. Nay, he's a thief too: have you not heard men say That Time comes stealing on by night and day? If Time be in debt and theft, and a sergeant in the way, Hath he not reason to turn back an hour in a day?
Re-enter LUCIANA with a purse

lines.speaker: adriana
lines.text: Go, Dromio; there's the money, bear it straight; And bring thy master home immediately. Come, sister: I am press'd down with conceit-- Conceit, my comfort and my injury. ANTIPHOLUS
Exeunt
